data.message: When will you bring Grape Fanta to the UK? You can't say it's due to tastes varying around the world because you've never actually tried it in the UK! I used to work at an American-themed confectionery store and it was one of our most popular drinks. At least give us a limited edition trial release!

replies.message: Hi Cameron, Fanta Grape is available in our Freestyle machines here in GB. For more info please visit: http://spr.ly/61808vzbi

I forgot to mention: the freestyle machine doesn't really count as an actual national release of the Fanta Grape variant. Anyway if that's the case, then why not stop producing all the other UK Fanta flavours as they're available via the freestyle machine too?
Also, how is a customer in a more rural area meant to enjoy this unofficial beverage?
